docs.snippet: In an atmosphere of excitement as the result of repeated threats of the Opposition, President Arturo Alessandri reopened this afternoon the ordinary sessions of the Chilean Congress.
docs.lead_paragraph: In an atmosphere of excitement as the result of repeated threats of the Opposition, President Arturo Alessandri reopened this afternoon the ordinary sessions of the Chilean Congress.
docs.abstract: Cong opens; Leftist demonstration prevents broadcast of Alessandri's s; Nazi Deputy Gonzalez arrested for firing shot

docs.lead_paragraph: and Senegal Parcel post for Gold Coast, Sierra Leone and Liberia. South America, West Indies, Etc. BUENAVENTURA (Panama Railroad), Port au Prince May 30 and Cristobal June 2 (mails close 1 P. M.), sails from W. 25th St. Letter mail and printed matter for Haiti. Also parcel post ESSO BOLIVAR (Standard Oil), Aruba, May 31 (mails close 5:30 A. M.), sails from Pier 6; Bayonne. Letter mail and Printed matter for Aruba.

docs.snippet: President Roosevelt joined with the Presidents of Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru and Uruguay today in sending messages to Presidents German Busch of Bolivia and Felix Paiva of Paraguay urging that they accept a proposal to be made tomorrow at the...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Roosevelt joined with the Presidents of Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru and Uruguay today in sending messages to Presidents German Busch of Bolivia and Felix Paiva of Paraguay urging that they accept a proposal to be made tomorrow at the peace conference in Buenos Aires, Argentina, for a definitive settlement of the Chaco controversy.
docs.abstract: Lrs to Presidents Busch and Paiva urge them to accept proposal to be made at Buenos Aires
